channel.title: Projects on Mudit Mittal
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mudit Mittal

item.title: Project 1
item.description: The project required me to work on Tableau to generate some useful insights from the dataset provided. I also performed Predictive Analytics using Python to predict the Annual Salary of the customers with the dataset provided. Link to Github repository

item.title: Project-2
item.description: Analyed text data using NLP library in python and created a bag of words. Cleaned the data using various methods under the NLP library. Created weightage of each sentence in the text data and based on that categorised them under different context categories. Link to Github repository
